name: Escape Evolution
description:
Escape from a strange laboratory in this retro platformer! :D

How To Play

Move and jump with the arrow keys, try using the down arrow sometimes, special forms have special abilities!

The Story

You wake up in somekind of laboratory.

You don't know who you are and what you're doing here.

You just have only one thing to do, escape.

Other Random Things

I would love to read a feedback on the Game, so feel free to write one! ^^

I made all the musics in LMMS with BFXR to generate the samples, ask me if you want them x)
